title: Wheel on the chimney
creator_credit: Cynthia Freitag, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: The charm of the European countryside is portrayed by sweeping pictures and rhythmic words in this tale of two storks who raise their young in Hungary and then fly south to spend the winter. From the book of the same title by Margaret Wise Brown and Tibor Gergely and narrated by John Cunningham.
